feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.4.7
entry.content: 🆕 Add ability to set field description and custom title 🛠 Allow to disable confetti 🛠 Show error if drawn signature is too small 🐞 Fix field drawing on safari 90% zoom 🐞 Fix audit log original checksum

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.4.8
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to right-align number field 🆕 Allow to disable stamp field logo 🐞 Fix form field font size

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.4.9
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to clone template from testing environment 🐞 Fix on app boot on LXC 🐞 Fix field options

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.0
entry.content: 🛠 Display signing date 🛠 Increase SMTP timeout 🛠 Flatten PDF annotations

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.5.1
entry.content: 🆕 Add submissions list views 🆕 Allow to customize the form completed message 🆕 Add Korean language
